artifacts.title: Field Notes: South Ridge
artifacts.body: Morning light rolls across the ridge like a soft blanket. We marked the trailhead, noted the shifting cloud cover, and logged the wind as it bent the grasses. The day ended with a slow climb and a surprising view of the valley.
artifacts.excerpt: Morning light rolls across the ridge like a soft blanket. We marked the trailhead, noted the shifting cloud cover, and logged the wind...
